ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Pradip Pathare has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 16 years. Currently he is employed as a Server DBA at GroupM (A WPP Company, New York) SQL. Pradip has extensive knowledge of Microsoft SQL Server, Microsoft SQL Server 2000, Microsoft SQL Server 7.0, Microsoft SQL Server 2005, Microsoft Transact-SQL, Microsoft SQL Server 6.5, Logic Works ERwin/ERX, Database Administration, Data Transformation Services, Stored Procedures, SQL, Oracle, Jakarta TOMCAT Servlet Engine, Clarify. So far Pradip has not gained any managerial experience.
